snippet: No longer treated with profound deference, King Juan Carlos and the rest of the monarchy are under scrutiny, and some residents are even calling for an elected head of state.
abstract: Memo From Spain; King Juan Carlos and rest of Spain's royal family no longer command profound deference they had previously enjoyed; politicians and journalists have increasingly begun to investigate family's every move, publicizing their embarrassments and accusations, with some residents even calling for an elected head of state.
lead_paragraph: No longer treated with profound deference, King Juan Carlos and the rest of the monarchy are under scrutiny, and some residents are even calling for an elected head of state.

headline.seo: Open Season on Spain’s Royal Family
headline.main: In Break With Tradition, It’s Open Season on the Royal Family
headline.print_headline: Long Above Scrutiny, King and Family Find The Throne Turning Hot

keywords.value: Juan Carlos I, King of Spain
keywords.name: persons
